exceptions.exn: In environment p : positive HP : iad_conv_prop p~1 IHp : iad_conv_prop p -> iad_conv_prop p~1~0 The term "1" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "positive".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall p : positive, iad_conv_prop p -> iad_conv_prop p~1~0

Premises:
Inductive positive : Set := xI : positive -> positive | xO : positive -> positive | xH : positive For xI: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For xO: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
iad_conv_prop = fun p : positive => (exists q : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_0 q) \/ (exists q : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_1 q) \/ (exists q r : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_2 q r) : positive -> Prop Argument scope is [positive_scope]
iad_conv_surj_0 : forall p : positive, iad_conv_prop p -> iad_conv_prop p~0~0
positive_rec : forall P : positive -> Set, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
positive_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
positive_sind : forall P : positive -> SProp, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
Pos.peanoView_xI : forall p : positive, Pos.PeanoView p -> Pos.PeanoView p~1
Pos.PeanoSucc : forall p : positive, Pos.PeanoView p -> Pos.PeanoView (Pos.succ p)
Pos.sub_mask_pos : forall p q : positive, (q < p)%positive -> exists r : positive, Pos.sub_mask p q = Pos.IsPos r
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
Pos.divide_xO_xI : forall p q r : positive, (p | q~0)%positive -> (p | r~1)%positive -> (p | q)%positive
Pos.le_trans : forall n m p : positive, (n <= m)%positive -> (m <= p)%positive -> (n <= p)%positive
Pos.lt_le_incl : forall p q : positive, (p < q)%positive -> (p <= q)%positive
EnvRing.env_morph : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (p : EnvRing.Pol C) (e1 e2 : positive -> R), (forall x : positive, e1 x = e2 x) -> EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi e1 p = EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi e2 p
Inductive PeanoView : positive -> Set := PeanoOne : Pos.PeanoView 1 | PeanoSucc : forall p : positive, Pos.PeanoView p -> Pos.PeanoView (Pos.succ p) For PeanoView: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For PeanoSucc: Argument scopes are [positive_scope _]
BinPosDef.Pos.divide = fun p q : positive => exists r : positive, q = (r * p)%positive : positive -> positive -> Prop Argument scopes are [positive_scope positive_scope]
Pos.mul_1_r : forall p : positive, (p * 1)%positive = p
Pos.sub_mask_carry_spec : forall p q : positive, Pos.sub_mask_carry p q = Pos.pred_mask (Pos.sub_mask p q)
Pos.add_1_l : forall p : positive, (1 + p)%positive = Pos.succ p
Pos2Nat.inj_xO : forall p : positive, Pos.to_nat p~0 = 2 * Pos.to_nat p
Pos2Z.inj_xI : forall p : positive, Z.pos p~1 = (2 * Z.pos p + 1)%Z
Pos2Z.pos_xI : forall p : positive, Z.pos p~1 = (2 * Z.pos p + 1)%Z
Pos.square_xI : forall p : positive, (p~1 * p~1)%positive = ((p * p + p)~0~1)%positive
Pos2Z.neg_xI : forall p : positive, Z.neg p~1 = (2 * Z.neg p - 1)%Z
Pos.xI_succ_xO : forall p : positive, (p~1)%positive = Pos.succ p~0
Pos.lt_succ_diag_r : forall p : positive, (p < Pos.succ p)%positive
Pos.pred_double_succ : forall p : positive, Pos.pred_double (Pos.succ p) = (p~1)%positive
aux_Neqb_1_0 : forall p : positive, (p =? p)%positive = true
Pos.add_diag : forall p : positive, (p + p)%positive = (p~0)%positive
Pos.succ_pred_double : forall p : positive, Pos.succ (Pos.pred_double p) = (p~0)%positive
EnvRing.Mphi_morph : forall (R : Type) (rI : R) (rmul : R -> R -> R) (M : EnvRing.Mon) (e1 e2 : positive -> R), (forall x : positive, e1 x = e2 x) -> EnvRing.Mphi rI rmul e1 M = EnvRing.Mphi rI rmul e2 M

```coq
intros p HP.
induction p using positive_ind.
- simpl. left. exists 1. reflexivity.
- destruct IHp as [|q|pq].
  ++ simpl. left. exists (p~1). rewrite Pos.square_xI. rewrite Pos.add_1_l. auto.
  ++ simpl. left. exists (p~0). rewrite Pos.xI_succ_xO. rewrite Pos.add_diag. auto.
  ++ simpl. left. exists pq. rewrite Pos.square_xI. rewrite Pos.succ_pred_double. rewrite Pos.add_1_l. auto.
Qed.```

original: intros p HP. induction p using positive_ind. - simpl. left. exists 1. reflexivity. - destruct IHp as [|q|pq]. ++ simpl. left. exists (p~1). rewrite Pos.square_xI. rewrite Pos.add_1_l. auto. ++ simpl. left. exists (p~0). rewrite Pos.xI_succ_xO. rewrite Pos.add_diag. auto. ++ simpl. left. exists pq. rewrite Pos.square_xI. rewrite Pos.succ_pred_double. rewrite Pos.add_1_l. auto.
